sourcesContent:
import axios from "axios"; import React from "react"; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const CardFavorites = ({movieID}) => { const [movie, setMovie] = React.useState([]) React.useEffect(() => { axios .get(`/api/movies/${movieID}`) .then((re) => (re.data)) .then((data) => { setMovie(data) }) }, []) const handleClick = () => { axios(`/api/favorites/${movieID}`) .then(() => alert(`Se elimino la pelicula ${movie.title}`)) } return(

{/* */}

{movie.title}

{movie.overview}

Fecha de lanzamiento:

{movie.release_date}

) } export default CardFavorites;
